title: Pip, the Monster Princess
subtle: Fantasy (fiction), 192 words, Level H (Grade 1), Lexile 440L, Fiction Series
description: Pip dreams of being a princess but is afraid she will have to make changes to herself in order to be one. She gets to work making a gown and fancy shoes. Will Pip become a princess? Students will have the opportunity to practice visualizing and distinguishing fantasy from reality.
reviewWords: daring, dream, fancy, glitter, princess, strolls
comprehension: Reality and Fantasy                : Distinguish between fantasy and reality
phonics: Short Vowels                : Identify short /i/ vowel sound
